text: Predpolozhim, chto u kogo-libo iz vas byli roshcha finikovykh pal'm i vinogradnik, v kotorykh tekut ruch'i i rastut vsyakiye plody. Predpolozhim, chto etogo muzha postigla starost', a deti yego slaby. Zakhotel by on, chtoby sad popal pod ognennyy vikhr' i sgorel v nem? Tak raz"yasnyayet Allakh vam ayaty, - mozhet byt', vy porazmyslite
